QuestData.Title: The Corruption's Source
QuestData.Description: I rushed here as soon as I heard the news from Wizbang. I know who's behind this mess now. Zenn Foulhoof.$B$BHe came over from Teldrassil after he was chased out for performing perverse magics. The kinds of corruption he employs are not welcome among my people, and it seems he's taken it a step further this time, perhaps as some form of revenge.$B$BZenn's been given too many chances, it's time we remove this threat to all that is natural. Kill Zenn and his minions, and then find me back in Lor'danel.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Patience and virtue only go so far. Some lines must never be crossed, and Zenn has crossed several of them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Zenn Foulhoof and 8 Vile Grell in Cliffspring Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: It is done then. Thank you. I only hope that the wildlife here will see more peace with his passing.
